onboarding_screen_1_title: Secure Your Data with Cloud Sync
onboarding_screen_1_desc: Keep your supermarket's data safe and up-to-date. Our system automatically syncs all your local information with secure cloud servers, ensuring data integrity and accessibility from anywhere, at any time.
onboarding_screen_2_desc: Effortlessly track your supermarket's performance. Monitor key metrics such as daily revenue, best-selling products, and customer trends to make informed decisions and stay ahead of the competition.
onboarding_screen_3_title: Drive Your Revenue to New Heights
onboarding_screen_3_desc: Turn insights into income. Leverage powerful analytics to identify growth opportunities, optimize your stock, and implement strategies that directly boost your supermarket's profitability.
name: Name
nameMinLengthError: Name must be at least 2 characters long.
emailInvalidError: Please enter a valid email address.
passwordMinLengthError: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
passwordLowercaseError: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
passwordUppercaseError: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
passwordDigitError: Password must contain at least one digit.
passwordSymbolError: Password must contain at least one symbol (e.g., !@#$%^&*).
passwordGeneralError: Password does not meet all criteria.
